title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.11 - Fees and out-of-pocket costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.11 - Fees and out-of-pocket costs

State Regulations

An administering corporation may charge reasonable loan
application and loan commitment fees pursuant to a schedule of fees adopted by
the administering corporation and approved by the corporation and may collect
such out-of-pocket expenses as it may reasonably incur in connection with the
processing of any loan application and the closing of any loan
hereunder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4215.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
